pull.title: guix: use a temporary file over sponge, drop moreutils

events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | Concept ACK | [davidgumberg](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34627#issuecomment-3931493225) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore. ### Conflicts Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones: * [#32764](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32764) (guix: Build for macOS using Clang only by hebasto) * [#25573](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25573) (guix: produce a `-static-pie` bitcoind by fanquake) If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Concept ACK, deletes a guix dependency

guix: use a temporary file over sponge

Remove sponge (moreutils).

events.message:
guix: use a temporary file over sponge

Remove sponge (moreutils).

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -401,11 +401,13 @@ mv --no-target-directory "$OUTDIR" "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR" \
 
 (
     cd /outdir-base
+    tmp="$(mktemp "${ACTUAL_OUTDIR}/tmp.XXX")"
     {
         echo "$GIT_ARCHIVE"
-        find "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR" -type f
+        find "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR" -type f -not -name "tmp.*"
     } | xargs realpath --relative-base="$PWD" \
-      | xargs sha256sum \
-      | sort -k2 \
-      | sponge "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR"/SHA256SUMS.part
+        | xargs sha256sum \
+        | sort -k2 \
+        > "$tmp";
+    mv "$tmp" "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR"/SHA256SUMS.part
comments.body:
Could be simplified I think by creating a tmp directory outside of `$ACTUAL_OUTDIR`

```bash
    tmp="$(mktemp)"
    {
        echo "$GIT_ARCHIVE"
        find "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR" -type f
    } | xargs realpath --relative-base="$PWD" \
        | xargs sha256sum \
        | sort -k2 \
        > "$tmp";
    mv "$tmp" "$ACTUAL_OUTDIR"/SHA256SUMS.part
```
